\section{Papers individuales}

\subsection{Show, Attend \& Tell \citep{xu2015attend}}

\subsection{Automatic Generation of Medical Imaging Reports \citep{baoyu_jing2018}}
\begin{itemize}
\item Image captioning with deep learning: \citep{vinyals2014tell}\citep{fang2014captions}\citep{karpathy2014deep}\citep{xu2015attend}\citep{krause2016hierarchical}\citep{you2016image}\citep{liang2017recurrent}
\item Hierarchical LSTM: \citep{krause2016hierarchical,liang2017recurrent}
\item Co-attention: \citep{ba2014multiple}\citep{xu2015attend}
\item Datasets: \citep{IUX-ray}
\item Metrics: BLEU\citep{papineni-etal-2002-bleu}, METEOR \citep{meteor},
ROUGE \citep{rouge}, CIDEr \citep{cider}
\item LSTM cannot effectively model long sequences: \citep{liu-etal-2015-multi}\citep{martin2018parallelizing}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Feature Difference Makes Sense \citep{park-etal-2020-feature-difference}}
\begin{itemize}
\item Image captioning with deep learning: \citep{vinyals2014tell,xu2015attend,karpathy2014deep,you2016image}\citep{zhou17-what-you-just-said}\citep{anderson2017bottomup}
\item X-ray datasets: \citep{kougia2019survey}\citep{johnson2019mimiccxrjpg}
\item Feature difference \citep{jhamtani2018learning}\citep{tan2019expressing}\citep{forbes2019neural}
\item Feature vectors from lower convolutional layers\citep{darlow2019what}\citep{bau2017network}\citep{zhou2017interpreting}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Visual Question Generation from Radiology Images \citep{sarrouti-etal-2020-visual}}

\subsection{A Survey on Biomedical Image Captioning \citep{kougia2019survey}}
\begin{itemize}
\item Focus on interesting regions: \citep{shin2016learning}
\item Reducing cost per exam: \citep{lee-korean-review-deep-learning-medical-imaging}
\item Baselines: \citep{zhang17-MDNet}\citep{wang18-TieNet}
\item Reevaluating metrics for captioning: \citep{kilickaya-etal-2017-evaluating}
\item Datasets: 
\begin{itemize}
\item IU X-ray (images, tags \& reports): \href{https://openi.nlm.nih.gov/faq}{https://openi.nlm.nih.gov/faq}\citep{IUX-ray}
\item PEIR-GROSS: \href{https://peir.path.uab.edu/library/index.php?/category/2}{https://peir.path.uab.edu/library/index.php?/category/2}
\item ICLEF-CAPTION (images, tags \& reports): \citep{ImageCLEFoverview2017}
\item ChestX-ray8 (images, tags, reports not public) \href{https://nihcc.app.box.com/v/ChestXray-NIHCC}{https://nihcc.app.box.com/v/ChestXray-NIHCC}
\citep{Wang_2017-chestxray8}
\end{itemize}
\item Methods:
\begin{itemize}
\item \citep{shin2016learning} CNN encoder trained to predict 17 classes
(MESH terms in IU X-ray)
\item \citep{zhang17-MDNet}
\item \citep{baoyu_jing2018}
\item \citep{wang18-TieNet}
\item iclef
\item \citep{gale2018producing}
\end{itemize}
\end{itemize}

\subsection{Deep learning in generating radiology reports: A survey \citep{monshi-review2020}}
